questions.quote: You're not gonna believe what I got in the mail. Invitation to Sue Ellen Mischke's wedding.
I never heard of anyone would turned down an apartment because of a weak shower spray.
It was a very nice sweater. Take a look at his neck, not to mention the melon sitting on top of it. I don't know if I'd trust him with a v-neck.
Well, they were humiliated. I mean after the impeachment, my father left office in disgrace.
Well, she was trying to call George last night, she got me, we spoke for an hour and she changed her mind!!!
We are gathered her today to unite this couple in holy... matrimony.
Ah, the drunken make-out. An office classic. Did you end up xeroxing anything?
Well, I'm sorry. Well, George, I tried to put the good word in for you with Siena, but I don't think she heard me. You know, left ear?
I can't. He loves me. He says I'm his most loyal customer. Plus he's right there on the corner. I'd have to pass him every day when I go by.
Yeah. Steinbrenner wants everyone in the front office to give a lecture in their area of business expertise.
